channel.title: "The process for the desktop protocol died unexpectedly"
channel.description:
Hello,
I have installed a portable version of VirtualBox on my flash and I am able to run both Whonix gateway & the workstation.
However as soon as I try open any application it crashes and tells me
"The process for the desktop protocol died unexpectedly"
I found a similar question on VirtualBox website but no one had an answer for them.
It is quite frustrating
Thanks H

item.title: "The process for the desktop protocol died unexpectedly"
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Anon007:

However as soon as I try open any application it crashes and tells me

On the host or within the VM?

On the host -> not a Whonix question. That would be independent of Whonix and a general VirtualBox / Windows question as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle.

Read full topic
item.source: "The process for the desktop protocol died unexpectedly"
